idea-plugin.name: Darcula Sombre
idea-plugin.description:
Darcula Sombre Theme: like Darcula Theme, with darker colors and unobtrusive borders.
Apply theme: File > Settings... > Appearance & Behavior > Appearance > choose Darcula Sombre theme and validate.
